### Chart A

```{r}
# The dataset uses 30 to denote >30, so I remove 30 to make the plot easier to read
instacart <- instacart |> 
  filter(days_since_prior_order < 30)
  
instacart |> 
  plot_ly(x = ~days_since_prior_order, type = "histogram", 
          name = "Days Since Prior Order")
```
